text: Willelm king gret mine biscopes and mina eorles and ealle mine þegnas, Frencisce and Englisce, on þan scyran þer sanctus Augustinus hefð land inne, freonlice.

And ic cyðe eow þat ic habbe geunnan Gode and sancte Augustine and þam hirede þe þerto hyreð, þat hieo bien heore sace weorðe and heora socna, and griðbryces, and hamsocna, and forstalles, and infangenesþeofes, and flemene fermðe ofer heora agene men, binnan burgh and butan, tolles and teames, on strande and on streame, and ofer swa fele þegna swa ic heom togeleten habbe.
And ic nelle þat anig man anig þing þeor onteo, butan heom and here wicneres þe hyo hit beotecen willan.
For þam þe ic habbe forgifen Gode and sancte Augustine þas gerihte minne sawle to alysednesse, ealswa Eadword king, min meg, ær efde.
And ic nelle geþafian þæt ænig man þis abrecan be minan frendscipe.
